user.title: Connect to MELCloud Home
user.description:
Follow these steps to get your cookie:

1. Log in to https://melcloudhome.com in your browser
2. Open Chrome DevTools (F12)
3. Click on the Network tab
4. Reload the page (F5 or Ctrl+R)
5. Click on the first request in the list (melcloudhome.com)
6. In the right panel, scroll down to Request Headers
7. Find the line starting with 'cookie:'
8. Right-click on the value (not on 'cookie:')
9. Select 'Copy value' and paste here

init.title: Update MELCloud Home Cookie
init.description: Update your MELCloud Home cookie here. Extract a new cookie from melcloudhome.com (Network tab → Request Headers → cookie).
